about.description:
Qt helps you create connected devices, UIs & applications that run
anywhere on any device, on any operating system at any time.
about.summary: Qt is a cross-platform application and UI framework.

about.description:

about.summary: Qt is a cross-platform application and UI framework.

name: qt6-datavis3d

about.description:
Qt helps you create connected devices, UIs & applications that run
anywhere on any device, on any operating system at any time.
about.summary: Qt is a cross-platform application and UI framework.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "6.4.1" %}

package:
  name: qt6-datavis3d
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://download.qt.io/official_releases/qt/{{ version.rpartition('.')[0] }}/{{ version }}/submodules/qtdatavis3d-everywhere-src-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  md5: 268f2d29b976a5ac06b41e1408788832

build:
  number: 0
  detect_binary_files_with_prefix: true
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('qt6-datavis3d', max_pin='x.x') }}


requirements:
  build:
    - cmake
    - ninja
    - perl
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - qt6-main  # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.17              # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xorg-x11-proto-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libx11-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxext') }}               # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxext-devel') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxrender-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libegl') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libegl-devel') }}     # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxau-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('alsa-lib-devel') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('gtk2-devel') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('gtkmm24-devel') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libdrm-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcomposite-devel') }}   # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcursor-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxi-devel') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxrandr-devel') }}       # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('pciutils-devel') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxscrnsaver-devel') }}   # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxtst-devel') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxfixes') }}             # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxfixes-devel') }}       # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libsm-devel') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libice-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcb') }}                # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcb-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('expat-devel') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('pcre') }}                  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libglvnd-glx') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libglvnd-egl') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxkbcommon-devel') }}    # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxshmfence-devel') }}    # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-devel') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-image-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-keysyms-devel') }}     # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-renderutil-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-wm-devel') }}          # [linux]
  host:
    - qt6-main
    - assimp
    - libzlib

test:
  requires:
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.17              # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xorg-x11-proto-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libx11-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxext') }}               # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxext-devel') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxrender-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libegl') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libegl-devel') }}     # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxau-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('alsa-lib-devel') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('gtk2-devel') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('gtkmm24-devel') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libdrm-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcomposite-devel') }}   # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcursor-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxi-devel') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxrandr-devel') }}       # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('pciutils-devel') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxscrnsaver-devel') }}   # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxtst-devel') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxfixes') }}             # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxfixes-devel') }}       # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libsm-devel') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libice-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcb') }}                # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcb-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('expat-devel') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('pcre') }}                  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libglvnd-glx') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libglvnd-egl') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxkbcommon-devel') }}    # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-devel') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-image-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-keysyms-devel') }}     # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-renderutil-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xcb-util-wm-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - cmake
    - ninja
  source_files:
    - examples/
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/qt6/QtDataVisualization/Q3DBars  # [unix]
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libQt6DataVisualization${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]

about:
  home: http://qt-project.org
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_file: LICENSES/GPL-3.0-only.txt
  summary: 'Qt is a cross-platform application and UI framework.'
  description: |
    Qt helps you create connected devices, UIs & applications that run
    anywhere on any device, on any operating system at any time.
  doc_url: http://doc.qt.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/qt/qtdatavis3d

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jschueller
  feedstock-name: qt-datavis3d

about.description:
Qt helps you create connected devices, UIs & applications that run
anywhere on any device, on any operating system at any time.
about.summary: Qt is a cross-platform application and UI framework.
